column4: can I remove evolution from my system ?? when I try to remove it with synaptics it requests to remove some other files that I dont know if they are important
yeah, it will probably scare you with something like remove ubuntu-desktop, but that is just a meta package.  You should be OK unless you should only lose functions that evolution provide to you.
hope ur right. I removed everything that has something to do with evolution
I'm pretty sure I've removed it in the past on a different release of Ubuntu so I'm pretty sure it is OK.
